about_the_game:
About Blazing Ace

“I want to be stronger…”

Summer bootcamp has begun!!! Let’s make your dream come true!
Beast Fella Foundation (BFF), an organization which monitors martial arts competitions among beastmen, has sent you an invitation letter. An unforgettable summer memory ensues.

Fight all the problems along with your teammates


  • Chikara
Cheerful powerhouse of the Judo club who is always willing to solve (and create) problems, especially those that make your heart skipping a beat.

  • Arato
Advisor coach of the Judo club, who can certainly guide you into great career paths from his extensive experience, although he might need some guidance about his love life.

  • Shirogami
Junior champion of beastmen fights. Your childhood friend who shares the same dreams with you. Not a person who is good with words. Strong when becoming an ally, but even stronger when you are his enemy (!?)

  • Taiyo
Shirogami’s best friend. Kind, warm, and super approachable. Another BFF participant who is always seen tagging along with Shirogami. What kind of strength does his small body hide?

Train hard. Sleep hard. And eat good food!!

Begin the legend of you and your friends!

features

  • Visual Novel filled with sweat and dreams of young men. Appropriate for both kids and adults alike.
  • Intense fighting scenes using digital arts
  • Martial arts dark secrets!?
  • Multiple endings included.
